raw_comment:
I notice that around the world people under 15-24 are more positive about future generations than people over 40.

I wonder why Mali is so negative for both ages? Are they living in the past or don't have electricity?

This affects my community because a lot of people in my area believe that the world is getting better, while some disagree.

Title for graph: "Generation Battle: Is the World Getting Better or Worse?"
